DIA_Saradoc_HELLO_What_03_02: I roam the kingdom looking for warriors to fight me. It seems there is no equal to you on this island.
DIA_Saradoc_HELLO_What_03_03: We must fight! May the best one win!
DIA_Saradoc_HELLO_NotNow_03_02: So you're just a coward? I should have seen it coming...
DIA_Saradoc_AfterFight_03_02: Another fight and another victory. Boy, you must not miss any opportunity to develop your skills! Experience lurks around every corner!
DIA_Saradoc_AfterFight_03_01: Not bad, not bad at all! I've never met a warrior who could stand up to me! Looks like I still have a lot to learn...
